text: Hello, I am a designer and developer. Here you will find some of the projects (professional and pastime) that I have worked on.

title: Leben in Deutschland Quiz
long_desc: A React web application.
Provides a training platform for the German state integration exam.
User can select location and choose from three different practice modes.

title: Leben in Deutschland Quiz (Native App)
long_desc: A native mobile application for Android and IOS.
Same functionality as the Leben in Deutschland web app.

title: Openschool.UK
short_desc: An Online Leaning Application for Children.
long_desc: The Open School was an e-learning application I developed and maintained from 2010 to 2017.

title: Ship-to-Turbine
short_desc: 3D Design, animation and production for JFMS
long_desc: An animated video for James Fisher Marine Services.
Showcasing the Ship-To-Turbine oil transfer process.
All 3D modelling and animation was done in Solidworks and Cinema 4D.

title: Tiger X Ident
long_desc: One of a few animated identity videos I made for Tiger X in the UK.
3D modelling and animation done in Cinema 4D.
Post-production in After Effects.

title: Mtindo
long_desc: A Wordpress + woocommerce webshop.
Designed and built custom front-end.

title: Popposites
long_desc: A HTML5 Js game I developed to help children learn vocabulary.
Programmed in vanilla Js.

title: HF4 drilled monopile installation
long_desc: A promo video which shows the HF4 vessel carrying out a monopile installation.
Created in Solidworks, C4D and After Effects.
Created whilst working as a Technical Deigner at Mojo Maritime.

title: HF4 Tidal Turbine Installation
long_desc: A promo video showing the HF4 vessel installing a Voith tidal turbine.
Created in Solidworks, C4D and After Effects.
Created whilst working as a Technical Deigner at Mojo Maritime.
